description: Creates a filter using the specified finding criteria.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Adversaries can create filters that suppress alerts for file deletion activities, allowing them to remove indicators of their presence without triggering alarms.

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateFilter to manipulate GuardDuty settings, potentially allowing malicious activity to go undetected.

simulation.value: aws guardduty create-filter --detector-id TrailDiscoverDetectorId --name TrailDiscoverFilterName --finding-criteria '{"Criterion": {"service.action.actionType": {"Eq": ["TrailDiscover"]}}}' --action NOOP
